Please enter the credit card number

The security code is a 3 digit number (last 3 digits) on the back of your Visa, MasterCard or Discover card. If your card is American Express, it will be a 4 digit number to the right above your card number on the front of the card.
Please enter the card expiration date
The expiration date is not valid

There are no featured plans at this time.
Your credit card on file will be charged.\nWould you like to proceed?
Your selected plan is being purchased.
%s was added to your account balance. Please continue with your order.
Your selected plan is being purchased. You can dismiss this message and the purchase will continue in the background.
Your purchase was successful. Thank you.
You must add a credit card to perform this operation.
You will now be returned to complete your plan purchase. Please resubmit your order.
The phone number you provided is invalid.
App list not ready.\nSave %s\nand check back later.
You must allow at least one service
Please enter a name for this contact
Please enter a valid phone number
Are you sure you want to delete this restriction?

For best results using this feature:

• Make sure %s is powered on and connected to WiFi or the cellular network
• Allow desired applications
• Check back periodically to get an up to date list of apps on %s
Do you want to log out after this operation or continue editing?
This device will no longer be able to make purchases, share plans or manage other devices.
You must select at least one day
The plan(s) you are exchanging have incompatible billing cycles, please try other selections.
The phone number you provided belongs to a subscriber in your account. You cannot send a gift to this number.
The phone number you provided is not register for smart services. You cannot send a gift to this number.
You need to activate your device to enable voice, text, and mobile data services.
Encountered runtime exception in the Service. Please provide log capture to Engineering.

You should only reprogram your phone if instructed to do so by a Customer service representative. Clicking \\confirm\\ will cause your phone to restart and reprogram its phone number. During this process, the phone will reboot twice and you will not be able to use your phone to place or receive any calls, including emergency calls. This will not affect any installed applications or data. Would you like to reprogram now?

Warning: You are about to make critical changes to your settings that could prevent you from accessing network services. Please confirm that you want to make this change.\n\nAre you sure you want to reset?
Declining terms and conditions will deny access to the service, are you sure you want to continue?

Add a number OR leave blank to delete

Could not communicate with the service. If you have recently made changes to your service please contact Support for assistance.

Your device is being turned on

To resume initialization later, please Tap the Jawwy icon. Are you sure you want to do this later?
There was a problem activating your device on the Jawwy network For help, tap Continue.
Talk, text and data services can now be tracked, changed and shared anytime right from the device!
A mandatory update for your device is available. To download this update, tap Install.
Your device is downloading a mandatory update. It will restart automatically when the download completes.
A mandatory update for your device is available. A previous download attempt failed. To download this update, tap Try Again.
Could not check for mandatory update.
An unexpected error occurred joining this device to your account. Please go back and try again.
Your device has successfully joined the account and plans and settings have been updated.
Add a Card to your Account
Connecting to Jawwy to activate your device is taking longer than expected. Please wait or try again later.
Connecting to Jawwy to activate your device is taking longer than expected. Please wait or try again later.
Please enter a valid email address.
An account with that email address already exists. Use a different email address to create a new account, or go back to the previous screen and tap \"Add to Existing Account\"
Sorry, you do not have a mobile data connection at this time.\nServices will be limited to talk and text operations only.\nWould you like to try connecting to WiFi?
Are you sure you want to skip this step?
Please select a security question for the account.
Failed to update your device nickname
Your credit card ending in %s has been successfully added. Please confirm order.
Your new account balance will be %s

your device is now active with its new number.

Your new phone number:

%s

Please make sure to update your contacts with your new number so they can reach you.

Please dial this number
##72786#
into your phone.
You may want to write this down.

Your phone number has been successfully transferred to your new phone.
To complete the transfer and reconnect text and mobile data services, you will need to tap the CONNECT NOW button below.
During this process, you will not be able to use your phone or make emergency calls.
Your phone will automatically restart twice during the process and you will see a \\Hands Free Activation\\ message after the first restart. Once started, you do not need to do anything but wait for the process to complete.

In order to complete the transfer of your number to your device, we need to first assign it a new temporary number.

During the assignment of the temporary number, you will not be able to use your phone or make emergency calls.

Your device will restart itself twice, and you may see several other messages as it updates and activates.

Your phone number has been successfully transferred to your device. In order to complete the transfer, your device will need to update itself with its new number.

During the update process, you will not be able to use your phone or make emergency calls.

Once you begin, your device will restart twice on its own, and you may see several other messages as it updates and activates.

A new phone number has been successfully assigned to your device.

In order to complete the assignment, your device will need to update itself with the new number.

During the update process, you will not be able to use your phone or make emergency calls.

Once you begin, your device will restart twice on its own, and you may see several other messages as it updates and activates.

Adding a Google account to your new device allows you to do things such as download apps from the Google Play™ Store, sync your phone and email contacts, and access Gmail™.\n\nWould you like to add a Google account now or finish setup?

To change between tabs at the top of screens, swipe the entire device window left or right. Dismiss this tip below and give it a try!
Welcome to Jawwy Control. Now you can control your Jawwy devices from anywhere
